com.innolabs.spydroid

Class XmlBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.innolabs.spydroid.XmlBuilder

  • public class XmlBuilder
extends Object
    Xml Builder is a class which creates XML files of the SPY data by getting the logs from the Database in which the SPY data is stored.
    Author:
    Srikanth Rao

    • Constructor Detail

      • XmlBuilder

        public XmlBuilder()
           throws IOException
        XML Builder Constructor to initiate the String Builder
        Throws:
        IOException - For catching Input Output Exceptions if occured during creation of the XML file

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start(String dbName)
        Method to Start creation of XML file by adding STANZA file and Main Database TAG into the XML file
        Parameters:
        dbName - Database Name for which the XML file is created

      • end

        String end()
     throws IOException
        Method that ends the Database Tag in the XML file
        Returns:
        String value which is appended i.e End tag for Database tag
        Throws:
        IOException - Exception to handle I/O runtime errors

      • openTable

        void openTable(String tableName)
        Method to add Table name tag into the XML file
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table name that will be added as the tag into the XML file

      • closeTable

        void closeTable()
        Method to add Table name closing tag into the XML file

      • openRow

        void openRow()
        Method to add row name tag into the XML file

      • closeRow

        void closeRow()
        Method to add Table name closing tag into the XML file

      • addColumn

        void addColumn(String name,
             String val)
         throws IOException
        Method to add Column tag file to the XML file
        Parameters:
        name - String value of the Column name
        val - Value field to add the actual value i.e the SPY data elements
        Throws:
        IOException - Catches Input Output Exceptions while appending or creating the XML file
